price: 111. Sungguh pada hari ini Aku memberi balasan kepada mereka, karena kesabaran mereka; sungguh mereka itulah orang-orang yang memperoleh kemenangan.
arabic: إِنِّي جَزَيۡتُهُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innī jazaytuhumu al-yawma bimā ṣabarū annahum humu al-fāizūna
